 Well, i told my daughter about it, and i did call it in this morning, i ho=
pe they find the child alive, and i am wrong, but everyone on the other sid=
e, says the child was murdered, one said it was some guy that had been hang=
ing around the camp grounds that day, and left, but he came back at night, =
have no idea how he got the little kid out of a tent with 4 or 5 sleeping p=
eople in it, if that's what it was, don't know, one spirit voice said it is=
 a "pedefile"

 and "we know him" is what they said, some lower spirits, to=
ld me what he did to the little kid, it was sick and can't repeat it here, =
his body is under a tree some where covered up with some dirt, if i heard t=
hat right.=C2=A0 I don't think his body is still in the camp area though.=
=C2=A0 But, yes, i called it in as a premonition dream i had, i have no ide=
a how to try to explain boxes.=C2=A0 Thanking the spirit world for all thei=
r help in finding the guy that did this horrible thing to a little toddler =
still in diapers. sf



-----Original Message-----
From: Rj <rasterer@ya=
hoo.com>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tue, Jul 27, 2010 1:36 pm
Sub=
ject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: depressing,

          =C2=A0                      =
            You asked several questions, so I'll take them one at a time:

=
1) you hope what? that i made a fool out of myself or that i called it in o=
r perhaps both?=C2=A0 
 
 I hope you called it in. Your resistance to givin=
g the police  information you said you thought you had on a child abductor,=
 even after  several prompts, makes me hope you did call it in, and didn't =
just say  that to stop me from prompting you. I don't know of course, I am =
not  there. I have no desire that you make a fool of yourself, but if it  h=
elps save a child from am abductor, I think it would be worth it.

2) Why d=
on't you get on the box, and do some asking? 

As I have said in the past, =
my experience with those boxes has shown me nothing paranormal yet.=C2=A0 H=
owever, people continue to say there is more to it than my experience.=C2=
=A0 And so, I am keeping an open mind and trying to examine the evidence yo=
u provide.

3) Why are negative people on these lists anyway. if you guys d=
on't believe  in this type of technology, why the heck are you all here? 

=
If I had absolulely no belief that there might be something interesting goi=
ng on with the technology, I would not have been so insistent that you give=
 your information to the police.=C2=A0 How could a person, of good conscien=
ce, not prompt you to give that information to the police?=C2=A0 Again how =
is that a negative thing to do?

Wouldn't the really negative thing be to i=
gnore it?

k him away, but from what i am hearing, and i could be wrong, very wrong, i=
 really hope i am wrong.=C2=A0 The man is a pedophile is what they said, fr=
om what the tech said, they will catch him soon.=C2=A0 "They will pick him =
up."

                         =C2=A0                            =
                          When you label the files with what you heard, you=
 influence the listener to try to hear what you heard, rather than what the=
y hear with no hints.=C2=A0 So if you want to know what people really hear =
without your hints, you need to send them out unlabeled.
     
     
     -=

<div style=3D"font-family: arial; color: black; font-size: 10pt;"> Well, i=
 told my daughter about it, and i did call it in this morning, i hope they =
find the child alive, and i am wrong, but everyone on the other side, says =
the child was murdered, one said it was some guy that had been hanging arou=
nd the camp grounds that day, and left, but he came back at night, have no =
idea how he got the little kid out of a tent with 4 or 5 sleeping people in=
 it, if that's what it was, don't know, one spirit voice said it is a "pede=
file"<br>
</div>

<div> and "we know him" is what they said, some lower spi=
rits, told me what he did to the little kid, it was sick and can't repeat i=
t here, his body is under a tree some where covered up with some dirt, if i=
 heard that right.  I don't think his body is still in the camp area t=
hough.  But, yes, i called it in as a premonition dream i had, i have =
no idea how to try to explain boxes.  Thanking the spirit world for al=
l their help in finding the guy that did this horrible thing to a little to=
ddler still in diapers. sf<br>
</div>

<div><br>
</div>

<div=
><table border=3D"0" cellpadding=3D"0" cellspacing=3D"0"><tbody><tr><td sty=
le=3D"font: inherit;" valign=3D"top">You asked several questions, so I'll t=
ake them one at a time:<br>
<br>
1) you hope what? that i made a fool out o=
f myself or that i called it in or perhaps both?  <br>
 <br>
 I hope y=
ou called it in. Your resistance to giving the police  information you said=
 you thought you had on a child abductor, even after  several prompts, make=
s me hope you did call it in, and didn't just say  that to stop me from pro=
mpting you. I don't know of course, I am not  there. I have no desire that =
you make a fool of yourself, but if it  helps save a child from am abductor=
, I think it would be worth it.<br>
<br>
2) Why don't you get on the box, a=
nd do some asking? <br>
<br>
As I have said in the past, my experience with=
 those boxes has shown me nothing paranormal yet.  However, people con=
tinue to say there is more to it than my experience.  And so, I am kee=
ping an open mind and trying to examine the evidence you provide.<br>
<br>
=
3) Why are negative people on these lists anyway. if you guys don't believe=
  in this type of technology, why the heck are you all here? <br>
<br>
If I=
 had absolulely no belief that there might be something interesting going o=
n with the technology, I would not have been so insistent that you give you=
r information to the police.  How could a person, of good conscience, =
not prompt you to give that information to the police?  Again how is t=
hat a negative thing to do?<br>
<br>
Wouldn't the really negative thing be =
to ignore it?<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
 <br>
<br>

en took him away, but from what i am hearing, and i could be wrong, very wr=
ong, i really hope i am wrong.  The man is a pedophile is what they sa=
id, from what the tech said, they will catch him soon.  "They will pic=
k him up." <br>
     </font></font></font> </div>
        
<div style=3D"fo=
nt-family: arial; color: black; font-size: 10pt;"> One group of spirit said=
, they know who he is, well, what should i do? sf<br>
     </div>

<div><table border=3D"0" cell=
padding=3D"0" cellspacing=3D"0"><tbody><tr><td style=3D"font: inherit;" val=
ign=3D"top">When you label the files with what you heard, you influence the=
 listener to try to hear what you heard, rather than what they hear with no=
 hints.  So if you want to know what people really hear without your h=
ints, you need to send them out unlabeled.<br>
     <br>
     <br>
     ---=
 On <b>Tue, 7/27/10, SnowfireL@aol. com <i><SnowfireL@aol. com></i></=

t-size: 10pt;"> Are you able to hear those few files I sent to the list?<br=

      If there is a chance you might be able to stop this Morgan =

<div style=3D"font-family: arial; color: black; font-size=
: 10pt;"> No, and no, this is a younger child, recently missing, I have not=

o me.  At this point no one else is able to hear my files, so I won't =
do a thing until i get validation from the so-called living first. sf<br>
